```{r}
library(datavolley)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      error = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
```

PIPPO2
================================================================================

```{r risultato}
x <- dv_read("example.dvw")

x$meta$teams %>%
    select(team, sets_won) %>% 
    gt(id = "one") %>%
    tab_header(title = "Risultato finale") %>% 
    fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>%
    tab_options(table.width = px(150),
                column_labels.hidden = TRUE) %>% 
    opt_css(
    css = "
    #one .gt_header {
      padding: 2px 3px;
      font-size: 10px;
      color: lightgreen;
    }
    #one .gt_row {
      padding: 2px 3px;
      font-size: 10px;
    }
    #one .gt_col_heading {
      text-align: center !important;
    }
    ")

```
